text: Ruben Östlund (born 13 April 1974) is a Swedish filmmaker. He is known for his movies Force Majeure (2014), The Square (2017) and Triangle of Sadness (2022). For his 2022 movie Triangle of Sadness, he was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Director and Best Original Screenplay. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish movie directors Category:Swedish movie producers Category:Swedish screenwriters
title: Ruben Östlund
